function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate representation of human movement in crowd models may lead to underestimation of disease transmission","Impact":"Underestimation of disease transmission can lead to increased risk of outbreaks and difficulty in implementing effective control measures","Mitigation":"Use of advanced crowd modelling techniques with accurate representations of human movement and interactions","Technologies":"Microscopic crowd modelling, biomechanical models","People":"Public, building occupants","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for individual attributes in crowd models can result in higher exposure of vulnerable individuals","Impact":"Higher exposure of vulnerable individuals can lead to increased risk of infection and transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Utilize microscopic crowd models coupled with EXPOSED to consider individual attributes and vulnerability factors","Technologies":"Microscopic crowd modelling, socio-demographic variables","People":"Vulnerable individuals, public health authorities","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"}]}
